name: slackoscope
description: Take a peek at slack msgs from inside your code. For those with no short term memory

commands.title: Slackoscope: Post Current File to Linear Issue

slackoscope.token.markdownDescription: Slack API token. Can be a plain text token or a 1Password reference (e.g., `op://vault/item/field`). See [1Password documentation](https://developer.1password.com/docs/vscode/) for details.

slackoscope.linearToken.markdownDescription: Linear API token (optional). Can be a plain text token or a 1Password reference (e.g., `op://vault/item/field`). See [1Password documentation](https://developer.1password.com/docs/vscode/) for details.

slackoscope.inline.enabled.description: Show inline message preview next to Slack URLs

slackoscope.inline.useRelativeTime.description: Show relative time (e.g., '5 minutes ago') instead of absolute time

slackoscope.inline.showUser.description: Show user name in inline preview

slackoscope.inline.fontSize.description: Font size for inline preview (in pixels)

slackoscope.inline.color.description: Color for inline preview text (CSS color)

slackoscope.hover.showChannel.description: Show channel name in hover tooltip

slackoscope.hover.showFiles.description: Show attached files in hover tooltip

slackoscope.highlighting.enabled.description: Highlight Slack URLs by message age

slackoscope.highlighting.todayColor.description: Background color for messages from today

slackoscope.highlighting.oldDays.description: Number of days before a message is considered old

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
